sentences.en: Click on this icon to align or justify text.
sentences.cn: 点击这个图标使文本排齐。

sentences.en: Click this option to right-justify the selected text.
sentences.cn: 点击这个选项，使选定的文本向右对齐。

sentences.en: Do the ends justify the means?
sentences.cn: 只要目的正当就可以不择手段 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does the end always justify the means?
sentences.cn: 只要目的正确,是否就可以不择手段?

sentences.en: Don't try to justify your mistakes.
sentences.cn: 不要为自己的缺点辩护.

sentences.en: He decided there was insufficient evidence to justify criminal proceedings.
sentences.cn: 他认定证据不充分无法提起刑事诉讼。

sentences.en: He tried to justify himself to me by saying that he was late.
sentences.cn: 他说他来晚了,企图以此向我辩解.

sentences.en: He tried to justify his absence with lame excuses.
sentences.cn: 他想用站不住脚的借口为自己的缺席辩解.

sentences.en: How can they justify paying such huge salaries?
sentences.cn: 他们怎能证明付这么大笔薪金是正当的呢？

sentences.en: How can you justify spending so much money?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能对花掉这么多钱做出令人满意的解释 呢 ?

sentences.en: I give myself treats and justify them to salve my conscience.
sentences.cn: 我常犒劳自己一番，然后找个说辞让自已良心稍安。

sentences.en: Ministers must appear before Parliament and justify their actions.
sentences.cn: 大臣们必须就自己的行为向议会作出解释。

sentences.en: No argument can justify a war.
sentences.cn: 没有任何理由能证明一个战争有理。

sentences.en: Nothing justifies murdering another human being.
sentences.cn: 什么都不能成为谋杀他人的正当理由。

sentences.en: The clamorous hunger in his belly seemed to justify him.
sentences.cn: 他肚中的辘辘饥肠似乎就是他的理由.

sentences.en: The oil companies were accused of contriving a shortage of gasoline to justify price increases.
sentences.cn: 石油公司被控故意制造石油短缺以名正言顺地提高油价。

sentences.en: They found it hard to justify their son's lowering his colours.
sentences.cn: 他们难以理解儿子竟然放弃了要求.

sentences.en: They justify every villainy in the name of high ideals.
sentences.cn: 他们打着实现远大理想的幌子为他们的每件恶行开脱。

sentences.en: We'll always justify our actions with noble sounding theories.
sentences.cn: 我们总会用听起来非常高尚的理论为我们的行动辩护。

trans.tran_en: To justify a decision, action, or idea means to show or prove that it is reasonable or necessary

trans.tran_cn: 证明…有理，为…辩护，对…作出解释
trans.tran_en: to give an acceptable explanation for something that other people think is unreasonable
